review.title: “Prison like policies with help bond developers together”
review.pros: Pros – A lot of smart and friendly people. Great place to learn a lot about printers and other technologies.
review.cons: Cons – Management creates a lot of policies that does not help the company grow. Overtime is very prevalent and has become the company norm for working hours.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Stop making silly policies that hinders development. Start trusting employees
